reviewText: This is a far more realistic feeling film than its namesake. Better scripted and better acted.  This is a biographical story of a young lady who lives her life both as an assertive intelligent individual and a masochist.  Anyone with an interest in BDSM might find interest or even inspiration in this movie.

reviewText: Not only is this a true story but also, the central character is playing herself! She confesses to being a masochist. She indulges in sado-masochism to make money. This is all unfolding while she is still in high school. Her long time dream is to be a slave. The story should not be revealed in a review. Let's just say, there's lots of bondage, some candle-wax burning, penetration and whipping. All the time, she begs for more. There's a lesbian whipping sequence with foul language while the master watches. The female tongues entwine like snake heads. There are interesting twists but not the kind anticipated. This film has serious intent because it conveys what some people want to do in their sex lives. What adds weight is its alleged authenticity. For the student of the erotic, as well as the bizarre, this is worth watching.Ian Hunter.Author of `e-Love'.
summary: An accurate rendition of a masochist
